message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $19,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $14,000.
